verses.verse: כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Surely יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Surely לַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for the silver מוֹצָ֑א <S%H4161><s%> there is a vein וּ֝מָק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and a place לַזָּהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> for gold יָזֹֽקּוּ׃ <S%H2212><s%> [where] they fine

בַּ֭רְזֶל <S%H1270><s%> Iron מֵעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> out of the earth יֻקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> is taken וְ֝אֶ֗בֶן <S%H68><s%> [out of] the stone יָצ֥וּק <S%H6694><s%> [is] molten נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> and brass

קֵ֤ץ ׀ <S%H7093><s%> an end שָׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> He setteth לַחֹ֗שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> to darkness וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the farthest תַּ֭כְלִית <S%H8503><s%> all perfection ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חוֹקֵ֑ר <S%H2713><s%> and searcheth out אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stones אֹ֣פֶל <S%H652><s%> of darkness וְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> and the shadow of death

פָּ֤רַץ <S%H6555><s%> breaketh out נַ֨חַל ׀ <S%H5158><s%> The flood מֵֽעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> from גָּ֗ר <S%H1481><s%> from the inhabitant הַֽנִּשְׁכָּחִ֥ים <S%H7911><s%> [even the waters] forgotten מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> by רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> of the foot דַּ֖לּוּ <S%H1809><s%> they are dried up מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> from men נָֽעוּ׃ <S%H5128><s%> they are gone away

אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [As for] the earth מִמֶּ֥נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at יֵֽצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> out of it cometh לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְ֝תַחְתֶּ֗יהָ <S%H8478><s%> and underneath נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> and under it is turned up כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> as it were fire
מְקוֹם־ <S%H4725><s%> of it [are] the place סַפִּ֥יר <S%H5601><s%> of sapphires אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H68><s%> The stones וְעַפְרֹ֖ת <S%H6083><s%> and it hath dust זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold לֽוֹ׃

נָ֭תִיב <S%H5410><s%> [There is] a path לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יְדָ֣עוֹ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth עָ֑יִט <S%H5861><s%> which no fowl וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor שְׁ֝זָפַ֗תּוּ <S%H7805><s%> hath not seen עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> eye אַיָּֽה׃ <S%H344><s%> and which the vulture's

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִדְרִיכֻ֥הוּ <S%H1869><s%> have not trodden בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> whelps שָׁ֑חַץ <S%H7830><s%> The lion's לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor עָדָ֖ה <S%H5710><s%> passed עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> over שָֽׁחַל׃ <S%H7826><s%> it nor the fierce lion

בַּֽ֭חַלָּמִישׁ <S%H2496><s%> upon the rock שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He putteth forth יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand הָפַ֖ךְ <S%H2015><s%> he overturneth מִשֹּׁ֣רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> by the roots הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> the mountains

בַּ֭צּוּרוֹת <S%H6697><s%> among the rocks יְאֹרִ֣ים <S%H2975><s%> rivers בִּקֵּ֑עַ <S%H1234><s%> He cutteth out וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything יְ֝קָ֗ר <S%H3366><s%> every precious thing רָאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> seeth עֵינֽוֹ׃ <S%H5869><s%> and his eye

מִ֭בְּכִי <S%H1065><s%> from overflowing נְהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> the floods חִבֵּ֑שׁ <S%H2280><s%> He bindeth וְ֝תַעֲלֻמָ֗הּ <S%H8587><s%> and [the thing that is] hid יֹ֣צִא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth he forth אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> to light פ

וְֽ֭הַחָכְמָה <S%H2451><s%> shall wisdom מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> But where תִּמָּצֵ֑א <S%H4672><s%> be found וְאֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> how זֶ֝ה <S%H2088><s%> he מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ? and where [is] the place בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> knowledge

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> Man עֶרְכָּ֑הּ <S%H6187><s%> not the price וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִ֝מָּצֵ֗א <S%H4672><s%> thereof neither is it found בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> The depth אָ֭מַר <S%H559><s%> saith לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not בִי־ הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> me' וְיָ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> It [is] not in me and the sea אָ֝מַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יֻתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> It cannot be gotten סְג֣וֹר <S%H5458><s%> for gold תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <S%H8478><s%> exchange וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִ֝שָּׁקֵ֗ל <S%H8254><s%> be weighed כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> neither shall silver מְחִירָֽהּ׃ <S%H4242><s%> [for] the price

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תְ֭סֻלֶּה <S%H5541><s%> It cannot be valued בְּכֶ֣תֶם <S%H3800><s%> with the gold אוֹפִ֑יר <S%H211><s%> of Ophir בְּשֹׁ֖הַם <S%H7718><s%> onyx יָקָ֣ר <S%H3368><s%> with the precious וְסַפִּֽיר׃ <S%H5601><s%> or the sapphire

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעַרְכֶ֣נָּה <S%H6186><s%> cannot equal זָ֭הָב <S%H2091><s%> The gold וּזְכוֹכִ֑ית <S%H2137><s%> and the crystal וּתְמ֖וּרָתָ֣הּ <S%H8545><s%> it and the exchange כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> of it [shall not be for] jewels פָֽז׃ <S%H6337><s%> of fine gold

רָאמ֣וֹת <S%H7215><s%> shall be made of coral וְ֭גָבִישׁ <S%H1378><s%> or of pearls לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not יִזָּכֵ֑ר <S%H2142><s%> No mention וּמֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H4901><s%> for the price חָ֝כְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom מִפְּנִינִֽים׃ <S%H6443><s%> [is] above rubies

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַ֭עַרְכֶנָּה <S%H6186><s%> shall not equal פִּטְדַת־ <S%H6357><s%> The topaz כּ֑וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia בְּכֶ֥תֶם <S%H3800><s%> gold טָ֝ה֗וֹר <S%H2889><s%> with pure לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תְסֻלֶּֽה׃ <S%H5541><s%> it neither shall it be valued פ

וְֽ֭הַחָכְמָה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> Whence תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> then cometh וְאֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> and where זֶ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> is the place בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> knowledge

וְֽ֭נֶעֶלְמָה <S%H5956><s%> Seeing it is hid מֵעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> from the eyes כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> of all living וּמֵע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> from the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air נִסְתָּֽרָה׃ <S%H5641><s%> and kept close

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> God הֵבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> understandeth דַּרְכָּ֑הּ <S%H1870><s%> the way וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> thereof and he knoweth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְקוֹמָֽהּ׃ <S%H4725><s%> the place

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לִקְצוֹת־ <S%H7098><s%> to the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יַבִּ֑יט <S%H5027><s%> For he looketh תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> under the whole heaven יִרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> [and] seeth

לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> To make לָר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> for the winds מִשְׁקָ֑ל <S%H4948><s%> the weight וּ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters תִּכֵּ֥ן <S%H8505><s%> and he weigheth בְּמִדָּֽה׃ <S%H4060><s%> by measure

בַּעֲשֹׂת֣וֹ <S%H6213><s%> When he made לַמָּטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> for the rain חֹ֑ק <S%H2706><s%> a decree וְ֝דֶ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and a way לַחֲזִ֥יז <S%H2385><s%> for the lightning קֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H6963><s%> of the thunder

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then רָ֭אָהּ <S%H7200><s%> Then did he see וַֽיְסַפְּרָ֑הּ <S%H5608><s%> it and declare הֱ֝כִינָ֗הּ <S%H3559><s%> it he prepared וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also חֲקָרָֽהּ׃ <S%H2713><s%> it yea and searched it out

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> he said לָֽאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> And unto man הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> Behold the fear אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> of the Lord הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> that חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> that [is] wisdom וְס֖וּר <S%H5493><s%> and to depart מֵרָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> from evil בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> [is] understanding ס
